summary: This bill, the "César E. Chávez and the Farmworker Movement National Historical Park Act," aims to establish and expand a historical park dedicated to César Chávez and the farmworker movement. It redesignates the existing César E. Chávez National Monument, outlines the park's boundaries (including potential additions in California and Arizona), and directs the Secretary of the Interior to manage the park and develop a general management plan.  It also mandates a study for a Farmworker Peregrinación National Historic Trail.
